title: Lemon poppy seed muffins with lemon drizzle
ingredients: ['220g plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '2 lemons, zested and juiced', '2 tablespoons poppy seeds', '2 2/3 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '235ml buttermilk', '75g soured cream', '80ml vegetable oil', '1 egg', '125g icing sugar']
